name: Genesis - Alpha (Early Access)
description:
I am uploading this very early version of my game because I would like to read some feedback! :D

It is mainly a story-driven game but people who like battles can also engage in those for as long as they wish and then pick up the story if they ever feel like it.

Thank you for taking the time to try it out.   :3
